LanguageData.Delicate.degreeDatas.delicate.label: delicate
LanguageData.Delicate.degreeDatas.delicate.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} has fragile skin and bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
LanguageData.Recluse.degreeDatas.recluse.label: recluse
LanguageData.Recluse.degreeDatas.recluse.description: The fewer people in {PAWN_nameDef}'s faction, the happier {PAWN_pronoun} is. Being alone is best of all.
